QuestData.Title: Baba Bogbrew
QuestData.Description: Hey, while you were out, the Baron stopped by! He kicked me until money came out!$B$BHe always does that though. But this time he asked me to tell you something! He wants you to go south and help out our herbalist, Baba Bogbrew.$B$BShe's all the way across the water! But just talk to my girl Daisy outside and she'll send you there the Crazy Larry way!
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Lil' Crazy Daisy to take a cannon ride to Baba Bogbrew.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, it's so nice to have help dropped in.$B$BModern convenience... I can't get enough of it.
